attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement to move out of the way of an emergency vehicle.
attributes.additional_details: An emergency vehicle attending a blue light 999 call could save somebody’s life as every minute counts, not just ambulances but all emergency services! Every minute helps towards EVERY 999 call!
attributes.background: I want it to be made a legal requirement for everyone to move out of the way of an emergency vehicle attending a blue light 999 emergency as every minute counts and could save somebody’s life.

rejection.details: The Emergency Workers (Obstruction) Act 2006 already makes it an offence to obstruct an emergency vehichle, and the Highway Code requires people to be aware of emergency vehicles.
